meanings.definition: A person who is on the same team as another.
meanings.sent1: My teammate and I work together to win games.
meanings.sent2: During the match, my teammate passed me the ball.
meanings.sent3: My teammate always brings the fun to our team meetings.
meanings.sent4: In the game of life, my teammate is my strongest ally.
meanings.sent5: Having a supportive teammate can make all the difference in sports.

meanings.definition: One of the members of a team.
meanings.sent1: Every teammate contributes to the success of the group.
meanings.sent2: As a teammate, it's important to communicate well with others.
meanings.sent3: My teammate's dance moves at the party were unforgettable.
meanings.sent4: Being a good teammate means having each other's backs.
meanings.sent5: The bond between teammates is like a chain, strong and unbreakable.
